headline.main: FIDLER IN BATTLE WITH ERROL FLYNN; Actor Hits Writer in Night Club Row and Latter's Wife Is Said to Have Wielded a Fork

lead_paragraph: HOLLYWOOD, Sept. 21 -- Errol Flynn, the stalwart movie hero, and Jimmie Fidler, movie columnist, engaged early today in another of those one-punch Hollywood battles -- this time over the current Senate movie investigation -- and the ending had a new and unhappy theme from the usual Flynn curtain.
abstract: E Flynn, actor, punches Fidler for his testimony, Hollywood
